frontmatter.title: Module 1: Intro to Jupyter Notebooks
frontmatter.description: In this module, you will learn how to write your own Jupyter Notebook. In Module 2 you will also learn how to install dependencies and configure your conda environment. In Module 4 we will talk more in detail about what a Binder entails.

frontmatter.title: Module 2: Setting up your working environment with conda
frontmatter.description: This module will teach you even more stuff and help you learn some new concepts.

frontmatter.title: Module 3: Intro to GitHub
frontmatter.description: This module will teach you about many cool things and introduce you to the most important concepts of the course.

frontmatter.title: Module 4: Introduction to Binder
frontmatter.description: This module will teach you how to use the Binder properly guaranteeing reproducibility of your notebooks and repositories.

frontmatter.title: Module 5: Working with RMarkdown
frontmatter.description: This module will teach you about many cool things and introduce you to the most important concepts of the course.

frontmatter.title: Module 6: Introduction to Docker
frontmatter.description: This module will teach you about many cool things and introduce you to the most important concepts of the course.

frontmatter.title: Module 7: Development best-practices including FAIR data principles
frontmatter.description: This module will teach you about many cool things and introduce you to the most important concepts of the course.

frontmatter.title: References and Resources
frontmatter.description: Here are scripts to re-use and links to additional references and topics to learn.
